text: Three statements are given about mole fraction  i) Mole fraction of a solute + mole fraction of solvent = 1  ii) Equal weights of Helium and methane are present in a gaseous mixture. The mole fraction of He is 4/5 iii) The mole fraction of water in the aqueous solution of NaOH is 0.8. The molality of the solution is nearly 14 moles kg-1
